ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Date_LOA_received_from_client__c) = FALSE, OR( ISPICKVAL(Authority_Type__c, ""), ISPICKVAL( Format_of_Signed_LOA__c , ""), ISBLANK( Signed_LOA_Link__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to complete all the fields: Format of Signed LOA, Authority Type, Signed LOA Link
